title: GitLab security advisory (AV25-549)
description: On August 27, 2025, GitLab published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: GitLab Community Edition (CE)  versions prior to 18.3.1, 18.2.5 and 18.1.5
GitLab Enterprise Edition (EE)  versions prior to 18.3.1, 18.2.5 and 18.1.5
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
